comment._content: I have it on good authority that this is one of [http://www.flickr.com/photos/lifeasdaddy/]'s favourite views Compare the brilliant Joseph Fowles watercolour drawing of c.1845 (in the gallery below) [http://www.flickr.com/photos/pellethepoet/galleries/72157624679501001]
